alert_name: API Gateway 5xx Error Rate Spike - Auth Service Down

alert_data.description: API Gateway experiencing unusually high rate of 500 Internal Server Errors. Authentication service unavailable - Redis connection failure causing cascading failures across all customer-facing APIs.

logs:
[2026-02-17 10:42:16] ERROR [auth-service] NullPointerException at TokenValidator.validate
[2026-02-17 10:42:19] CRITICAL [auth-service] Redis connection failed: Connection refused
[2026-02-17 10:42:20] ERROR [api-gateway] Upstream service unavailable: auth-service
[2026-02-17 10:42:21] ERROR [checkout-api] Authentication failed for user requests

root_causes: Auth service Redis cache unavailable (connection refused)
NullPointerException in TokenValidator causing service crash
Cascading failures across all APIs requiring authentication
mitigation_steps: Rollback auth-service to previous stable version
Monitor error rate recovery and customer impact
ground_truth.actual_root_cause: Recent deployment introduced null pointer bug + Redis cluster failure
